trans-unit.source: Customizes rendering for the Web control to which the control adapter is attached, to modify the default markup or behavior for specific browsers.
trans-unit.target: Customizes composição para o controlo Web ao qual está ligado o adaptador de controlo, para modificar a marcação de predefinição ou comportamento para browsers específicos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class is the base class from which Web controls inherit.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>classe é a classe base a partir da qual herda controlos de Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: It defines many properties common to all Web controls.
trans-unit.target: Define várias propriedades comuns a todos os controlos de Web.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: A WebControlAdapter object is a component that substitutes certain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class or inherited methods and events in its execution life cycle to allow browser- or markup-specific handling.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de WebControlAdapter é um componente que substitui determinados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>classe ou herdados de métodos e eventos no respetivo ciclo de vida de execução para permitir o processamento de browser específico ou a marcação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework maps a single control adapter to a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object for each client request.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework mapeia um adaptador de controlo único para um derivada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>objeto para cada pedido de cliente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: An adapter modifies a control behavior for a specific browser or class of browsers or acts as an arbitrary filter on some capability.
trans-unit.target: Um adaptador modifica um comportamento de controlo de um browser específico ou a classe de browsers ou age como um filtro em alguma capacidade arbitrário.

trans-unit.source: Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: Muitas das adaptability no comportamento de composição pode ser encapsulada nas classes especializadas que derivam da <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is likely that a single adapter can be used for a number of browser class behaviors or that inclusion of the adaptability in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> classes might make the use of a control adapter unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, é provável que uma única placa pode ser utilizada por um número de comportamentos de classe do browser ou que inclusão de adaptability no <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>classes podem tornar a utilização de um adaptador de controlo desnecessários.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Controls themselves do not necessarily require an adapter.
trans-unit.target: Controlos próprios não exige necessariamente de um adaptador.

trans-unit.source: If controls are extended through composition, generally the adapters for the child controls are sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Se os controlos são expandidos através de composição, geralmente, os adaptadores para os controlos subordinados são suficientes.

trans-unit.source: Each control has explicit mappings to adapters through the .browser definition files.
trans-unit.target: Cada controlo tem mapeamentos explícitos aos adaptadores através de ficheiros de definição de .browser.

trans-unit.source: Thus, any access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> object extracted from the .browser definition files to perform the lookup for the mapping of the adapter to control.
trans-unit.target: Assim, qualquer acesso ao <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>utiliza o <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>objeto extraído dos ficheiros de definição do .browser para efetuar a pesquisa para o mapeamento do adaptador para o controlo de.</xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>

trans-unit.source: During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the overridable methods of a control that could be target-specific.
trans-unit.target: Durante o processamento, o .NET Framework interceta chamadas para os métodos substituíveis de um controlo que pode ser específicos de destino.

trans-unit.source: If a control adapter is attached, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods.
trans-unit.target: Se está ligado um adaptador de controlo, o .NET Framework chama os métodos de adaptador associado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The rendering for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> typically consists of a beginning and ending tag, and some inner markup between the beginning and ending tags.
trans-unit.target: A composição para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>normalmente é composta por um início e fim tag e algumas marcação interna entre o início e fim etiquetas.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: The tags are defined when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> is created.
trans-unit.target: As etiquetas são definidas quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>é criado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The tags are generated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: As etiquetas foram geradas pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>métodos, respetivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The inner markup is generated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A marcação interna é gerada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A> method generates all markup, by calling methods in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>método gera todos os markup, ao chamar os métodos pela seguinte ordem: 1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderContents%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.IsEnabled%2A> property returns `true` only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> and all its parent controls are enabled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.IsEnabled%2A>propriedade devolve `true` apenas se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>e todos os respetivos controlos principal estão ativados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.IsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Control%2A> property returns a strongly typed reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Control%2A>propriedade devolve uma referência de tipo seguro para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> class when it creates the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework constrói internamente uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter>classe quando cria o correspondente <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the Web control to which this control adapter is attached.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para o controlo Web ao qual está ligado este adaptador de controlo.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> object is attached to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object, the .NET Framework calls on the adapter life-cycle methods instead of the control methods.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter>objeto está ligado a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>objeto chama o .NET Framework nos métodos de ciclo de vida do adaptador em vez dos métodos de controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref> to which this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter"></xref> is attached.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"> </xref> para que esta <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter"> </xref> está ligado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the Web control and all its parent controls are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controlo da Web e todos os respetivos controlos de principal estão ativados.

trans-unit.source: The IsEnabled property provides access for the adapter and any of its derived classes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade IsEnabled fornece acesso para o adaptador e qualquer uma das respetivas classes derivadas para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> scans the hierarchy of parent controls and returns `true` only if the Web control and all its parents are enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>analisa a hierarquia de controlos de principal e devolve `true` apenas se o controlo da Web e todos os respetivos elementos principais estão ativados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref> and all its parent controls are enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"> </xref> e todos os respetivos controlos de principal estão ativados; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates the target-specific markup for the control to which the control adapter is attached.
trans-unit.target: Gera a marcação de destino específicos para o controlo ao qual está ligado o adaptador de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The Render method generates target-specific markup to send to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: O método de composição gera markup de destino específicos para enviar para o browser cliente.

trans-unit.source: Render is called in place of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> object is attached to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object.
trans-unit.target: Render ser chamado em vez do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter>objeto está ligado a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> containing methods to render the target-specific output.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que contém métodos para compor o resultado de destino específicos.

trans-unit.source: Creates the beginning tag for the Web control in the markup that is transmitted to the target browser.
trans-unit.target: Cria a tag de início para o controlo Web na marcação de que é transmitida para o browser de destino.

trans-unit.source: Override the RenderBeginTag method to write additional markup tags or add attributes to the beginning tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object.
trans-unit.target: Substitua o método de RenderBeginTag para escrever as etiquetas de marcação adicionais ou adicionar atributos para a tag de início para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: Use RenderBeginTag in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A> method to assure beginning and ending tag consistency.
trans-unit.target: Utilize RenderBeginTag em conjunto com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>método para garantir o início e fim de consistência de tag.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> containing methods to render the target-specific output.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que contém métodos para compor o resultado de destino específicos.

trans-unit.source: Generates the target-specific inner markup for the Web control to which the control adapter is attached.
trans-unit.target: Gera a marcação interna específicos de destino para o controlo Web ao qual está ligado o adaptador de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The RenderContents method generates the inner markup, between the beginning and ending tags for the control.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderContents gera a marcação interna, entre o início e fim etiquetas do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Typically, markup is generated by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>, which calls methods in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, a marcação é gerada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>, que métodos de chamadas de ordem seguinte: 1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: RenderContents.
trans-unit.target: RenderContents.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderEndTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: Override RenderContents to generate target-specific inner markup to send to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: Substitua RenderContents para gerar markup interna do destino específicos para enviar para o browser cliente.

trans-unit.source: The RenderContents base method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os RenderContents base chamadas de método <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=fullName> base method calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, which in turn calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: As <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>chamadas método base a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, o que por sua vez, chama <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Thus, overrides of RenderContents should call the RenderContents base method only if its processing is in addition to, rather than instead of, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Assim, substituições de RenderContents devem chamar o método base RenderContents apenas se o processamento, para além, em vez de em vez <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> containing methods to render the target-specific output.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que contém métodos para compor o resultado de destino específicos.

trans-unit.source: Creates the ending tag for the Web control in the markup that is transmitted to the target browser.
trans-unit.target: Cria a tag de fim para o controlo Web na marcação de que é transmitida para o browser de destino.

trans-unit.source: Override the RenderEndTag method to write additional markup tags or add attributes to the ending tag for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> object.
trans-unit.target: Substitua o método de RenderEndTag para escrever as etiquetas de marcação adicionais ou adicionar atributos para a tag de fim para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>

trans-unit.source: Use RenderEndTag in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A> method to assure beginning and ending tag consistency.
trans-unit.target: Utilize RenderEndTag em conjunto com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>método para garantir o início e fim de consistência de tag.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter.RenderBeginTag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> containing methods to render the target-specific output.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que contém métodos para compor o resultado de destino específicos.
